pages.text: A garden will succumb to chaos in the face of neglict, but a quicker fall from grace is an explosion. Despite the best efforts of floralists everywhere, creepers have wandered in and left their mark time and time again. But luckily, there's a solution. By wearing a clay totem on one's neck infused with Dew, the necklace can consume all of the energy of the explosion.
Unfortunately, given its nature, these charms are fragile and will shatter after consuming a single blast. But, fortunately, they can be repaired with a bit of essence.
